attributes.action: make it law that all air pssengers are covered by a bonding scheme  to be re-patriated if the need arises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the collapse of XL 10000 pssengers  who were not covered by ATOL had to make own arrangements to return home at there own exepense.
The cost to ATOL bonded passengers was a contribution of £1 towards the ATOL protction scheme.It should be the law that all passengers are protected in this way
